title: Bang the drum slowly. - Edited Version.
creator_credit: John Hancock, Lois Rosenfield and Maurice Rosenfield
brief_description: Edited version of the feature film based on Mark Harris’s classic story of friendship, compassion and death set against a background of major-league baseball. Robert de Niro stars as the baseball hero who discovers that he is dying of leukemia.
